price: 29. Apa yang di langit dan di bumi selalu meminta kepada-Nya. Setiap waktu Dia dalam kesibukan.*(821)
arabic: يَسۡـَٔلُهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ كُلَّ يَوۡمٍ هُوَ فِي شَأۡنٖ
footnotes: *821). Allah senantias menciptakan, menghidupnkan, mematikan, memelihara, memberi rezeki, dan lain-lain.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yasaluhu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi kulla yawmin huwa fī shanin
